00016     class OpMessageBox : public Opcode1
00017     {
00018         public:
00019 
00020             virtual void execute (Runtime& runtime, unsigned int arg0)
00021             {
00022                 // message
00023                 int index = runtime[0].mInteger;
00024                 runtime.pop();
00025                 std::string message = runtime.getStringLiteral (index);
00026 
00027                 // buttons
00028                 std::vector<std::string> buttons;
00029 
00030                 for (std::size_t i=0; i<arg0; ++i)
00031                 {
00032                     int index = runtime[0].mInteger;
00033                     runtime.pop();
00034                     buttons.push_back (runtime.getStringLiteral (index));
00035                 }
00036 
00037                 std::reverse (buttons.begin(), buttons.end());
00038 
00039                 // additional parameters
00040                 std::string formattedMessage;
00041 
00042                 for (std::size_t i=0; i<message.size(); ++i)
00043                 {
00044                     char c = message[i];
00045 
00046                     if (c!='%')
00047                         formattedMessage += c;
00048                     else
00049                     {
00050                         ++i;
00051                         if (i<message.size())
00052                         {
00053                             c = message[i];
00054 
00055                             if (c=='S' || c=='s')
00056                             {
00057                                 int index = runtime[0].mInteger;
00058                                 runtime.pop();
00059                                 formattedMessage += runtime.getStringLiteral (index);
00060                             }
00061                             else if (c=='g' || c=='G')
00062                             {
00063                                 Type_Integer value = runtime[0].mInteger;
00064                                 runtime.pop();
00065 
00066                                 std::ostringstream out;
00067                                 out << value;
00068                                 formattedMessage += out.str();
00069                             }
00070                             else if (c=='f' || c=='F' || c=='.')
00071                             {
00072                                 while (c!='f' && i<message.size())
00073                                 {
00074                                     ++i;
00075                                 }
00076 
00077                                 float value = runtime[0].mFloat;
00078                                 runtime.pop();
00079 
00080                                 std::ostringstream out;
00081                                 out << value;
00082                                 formattedMessage += out.str();
00083                             }
00084                             else if (c=='%')
00085                                 formattedMessage += "%";
00086                             else
00087                             {
00088                                 formattedMessage += "%";
00089                                 formattedMessage += c;
00090                             }
00091                         }
00092                     }
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 runtime.getContext().messageBox (formattedMessage, buttons);
00096             }
00097     };

00109     class OpRandom : public Opcode0
00110     {
00111         public:
00112 
00113             virtual void execute (Runtime& runtime)
00114             {
00115                 double r = static_cast<double> (std::rand()) / RAND_MAX; // [0, 1)
00116 
00117                 Type_Integer limit = runtime[0].mInteger;
00118 
00119                 if (limit<0)
00120                     throw std::runtime_error (
00121                         "random: argument out of range (Don't be so negative!)");
00122 
00123                 Type_Integer value = static_cast<Type_Integer> (r*limit); // [o, limit)
00124 
00125                 runtime[0].mInteger = value;
00126             }
00127     };
